name: God does not play dice (Shockaedit)
description:
GAMEPLAY :

This is a Clicker/ Idle Game

  • Click to roll your magical dice
  • Collect souls to upgrade your dice or to buy upgrades

Some of this game art was made using MidJourney AI.
